About Us

Our Vision

To become a growing global movement of Christian communities and ministries that brings the influence of the kingdom of God to the nations and fulfills the mandate of the Great Commission.

Our Mission

  • To build community of believers passionate to worship God and committed to live for His purposes.
  • To produce christ-like disciples trained and equipped to minister and impact their communities with the message of the gospel of Christ in the power of the Holy Spirit.
  • To develop meaningful relationships with various Christian networks and ministries partnering together with them in reaching out people and nations for the glory of God.
  • To establish sustainable ministry bases to connect and serve the community through practical holistic programs.
  • To empower the younger generation to impact their own generation for God and to embrace the vision to pursue God’s purposes.

Our Community

We are a Pentecostal movement whose heart is in building up transformed and empowered communities of faith with a desire to live out God’s Word and reflect His service and ministry so we can influence the world.
